csrftoken.function: Protects against Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks.
csrftoken.description: This cookie is used to protect against Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.

sessionid.function: Preserves user session state across page requests.
sessionid.description: Preserves user session state across page requests.

PHPSESSID.function: Maintains user session on PHP-based websites.
PHPSESSID.description: Used to establish and maintain a user session across page requests on PHP sites.

_ga.function: Registers a unique ID to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
_ga.description: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

_gid.function: Registers a unique ID to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.
_gid.description: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

_gat.function: Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate.
_gat.description: Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate.

IDE.function: Registers and reports the user's actions after viewing or clicking one of the advertiser's ads.
IDE.description: Used by Google DoubleClick to register and report the website user's actions after viewing or clicking one of the advertiser's ads.

NID.function: Remembers your preferences and other information, such as preferred language.
NID.description: Contains a unique ID that Google uses to remember your preferences and other information, such as preferred language.

cookieconsent_status.function: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.
cookieconsent_status.description: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.

_fbp.function: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real-time bidding from third party advertisers.
_fbp.description: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real-time bidding from third party advertisers.

AEC.function: Used internally by Google to manage network and session state.
AEC.description: This cookie is used by Google to manage sessions and network state for optimal user experience.

__cfduid.function: Used by Cloudflare to identify individual clients behind a shared IP address and apply security settings on a per-client basis.
__cfduid.description: This cookie is used by Cloudflare to identify individual clients behind a shared IP address and apply security settings on a per-client basis. It does not correspond to any user ID in the web application and does not store any personally identifiable information.

__stripe_mid.function: Used by Stripe to prevent fraud.
__stripe_mid.description: This cookie is set by Stripe to prevent fraud and abuse of their services.

__stripe_sid.function: Used by Stripe to prevent fraud.
__stripe_sid.description: This cookie is set by Stripe to prevent fraud and abuse of their services.

_ym_uid.function: Used by Yandex Metrica to identify users.
_ym_uid.description: This cookie is used by Yandex Metrica to identify users and gather information about their activity on the website.

_ym_d.function: Used by Yandex Metrica to determine the date of the user's first session.
_ym_d.description: This cookie is used by Yandex Metrica to determine the date of the user's first session on the website.

_ym_isad.function: Used by Yandex Metrica to determine if the user has an ad blocker.
_ym_isad.description: This cookie is used by Yandex Metrica to determine if the user has an ad blocker installed.

test_cookie.function: Used by DoubleClick to check if the user's browser supports cookies.
test_cookie.description: This cookie is set by DoubleClick (Google) to determine if the user's browser supports cookies.
